Html:
I am using club starter kit 2.0.  When I use send e-mail to just Editors it send it.

When I send e-mail to All Members it goes to my error page.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

There is no row at position 0.

Description:

An unhandled exception occurred during the execution of the current web request. Please review the stack trace for more information about the error and where it originated in the code.

Exception Details: System.IndexOutOfRangeException: There is no row at position 0.

Source Error:

Line 416: Public Default ReadOnly Property Item(ByVal index As Integer) As MemberInfoRow

Line 417: Get

Line 418: Return CType(Me.Rows(index),MemberInfoRow)

Line 419: End Get

Line 420: End Property

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What does this mean?

How can I fix this?

LHR
Apparently you have to check one of the roles boxes for all the members to send an e-mail.
